comments.en:
Special japanese printer driver.

This driver is a candidate for being marked obsolete with "stcolor" as recommended replacement.

This driver was not maintained any more for longer time and is broken in current Ghostscript. Please use "stcolor" for these printers. They are not (yet) listed as supported by "stcolor" but this driver is probably the one which will most probably work. Please try similar models, especially the Epson Stylus 800. If you have found a suitable driver and printer model, preferably one which we did not mark as obsolete, please tell us by reporting a bug on our bug tracking system. Choose "OpenPrinting" as product and "foomatic-db" as component.
